name: Orc Snarl
description: Your attacks leave your opponent quivering in fear.
prerequisites: Bullying Blow, Intimidating Prowess, Orc Fury Style, Orc Rampage, Intimidate 7 ranks, weapon familiarity racial trait
benefit: While using Orc Fury Style, you gain a +4 bonus on saving throws against effects created by shaken foes.
